title: Migration Knowledge Check
description: Test your understanding of database migrations.

questions.question: When should you increment the schemaVersion?
options: Every time you run the app
When you add, remove, or modify table structure
Only when the app version changes
questions.explanation: You should increment schemaVersion whenever you change the database schema - adding columns, removing columns, adding tables, changing constraints, etc.

questions.question: In SQLite with Drift, how do you change a column's type?
options: Recreate the table with the new schema
questions.explanation: SQLite doesn't support ALTER COLUMN. To change a column type, you must create a new table, copy the data, drop the old table, and rename the new one.
